page.title: 03CHARDSTOCK COMMUNITY HALL
page.content: The Community Hall was built in the late 1970s the money was raised by a Parish fund raising committee.The money raised was Â£25,000 which included loans that are still being repaid today.Grants costing Â£40,000 from Puplic Bodies were obtained.The majority of the work was done by volunteers from the village.The Hall is run by a management committee with representatives from all the clubs and organisations in the village.The Hall is used for many fund raising events e.g. Discos and Jumble sales also the Wednesday Club hire the Community Hall for one Wednesday every month.In the Hall there is a Committee room and a Kitchen for making things for special occasions.Bookings are taken from outside the village these include Wedding receptions and Caravan Rallies.
